Getting Started with World Bank data API in R 1 Introduction

Getting Started with World Bank data API in R Andrew Whitby, DECDG 7/6/2017 1 Introduction This is a brief tutorial covering what an API is, in the context of accessing data, and how to use R to access and plot data from the World Bank data API.
